short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: save jobs to your job search spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion app to the Job Search spreadsheet template (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1swOY-SNqPLy513ED3oEw9KXv62yQo4vp2FJWjyqrj_A/edit?usp=sharing). 

Find a job on LinkedIn or Indeed? Add it to your job search tracking spreadsheet in seconds with this extension. Just fill out the company and role, and hit submit - your new application immediately shows up in your spreadsheet!

Use this extension in conjunction with the Job Search + Networking Spreadsheet Template (link above) to make your search as organized and painless as possible. Staying on top of recruiting is hard, so we built this to help!
